definition: a strip forming the outer edge of something, to lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
details:
noun
- a strip forming the outer edge of something
= example: a strip forming the outer edge of something
- a decorative recessed or relieved surface on an edge
= synonyms: molding
- a line that indicates a boundary
= synonyms: borderline
- the boundary of a surface
= synonyms: edge
- the boundary line or the area immediately inside the boundary
= synonyms: margin, perimeter
verb
- to lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
= example: to lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
= synonyms: march
- to extend on all sides of simultaneously
= example: to extend on all sides of simultaneously
= synonyms: ring
- to enclose in or as if in a frame
= example: to enclose in or as if in a frame
= synonyms: frame
- to provide with a border or edge
= example: to provide with a border or edge
= synonyms: edge
- to form the boundary of
= example: to form the boundary of
= synonyms: bound
